meanings.definition: To observe or study birds in their natural habitat.
meanings.sent1: She birdwatches every morning in the park.
meanings.sent2: He birdwatches to learn more about different bird species.
meanings.sent3: The little girl birdwatches with her toy binoculars, pretending to be a scientist.
meanings.sent4: His eyes birdwatched the sky, searching for the elusive eagle.
meanings.sent5: Birdwatching brings her joy as she observes the colorful feathers of the birds.

meanings.definition: A person who watches or studies birds.
meanings.sent1: The birdwatches spotted a rare species in the forest.
meanings.sent2: Many birdwatches gather at the annual birdwatching event.
meanings.sent3: The young birdwatch was excited to add a new bird to their list.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the best birdwatch in the town, always spotting the most birds.
meanings.sent5: The dedicated birdwatch spent hours in the wilderness, observing the behavior of different birds.
